item.title: Minigame reward help
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

well i got a simple minigame where you kill a monster, then your telported to the next one, well when you finish the game you get a reward. wich is a fighter torso

int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addItem(11268, 1);
ppl.sendMessage(“The minigame is complete! congratulations!”);
ppl.teleportToX = 2609;
ppl.teleportToY = 3159;

so i got that. but i was wondering how would i make it give a chance at a different item without it adding it?

so instead of adding another item and getting a torso+ a white partyhat i want it to give a torso OR a white partyhat. how would i do this?

Read full topic
